objective.problem_statement: Create a hands-free voice interaction system that allows real-time speech-to-text transcription and AI-powered response generation
objective.solution_approach: Develop a modular Python application that uses Whisper for speech recognition, Gemini for AI response generation, and gTTS for audio playback, triggered by a Caps Lock key press

key_contributions: Implemented a custom CapsLockListener for triggering voice recording
Created an advanced AudioTranscriber with dynamic noise filtering
Integrated Whisper for accurate speech-to-text transcription
Developed a text-to-speech module with multi-threaded audio playback
technical_challenges_solved: Dynamic audio threshold detection to filter out background noise
Resampling audio input to match Whisper model requirements
Handling cross-platform audio input and processing
Implementing non-blocking audio recording and playback

project_outcomes: Seamless voice interaction with AI using minimal user interface
Low-latency speech recognition and response generation
Flexible audio processing adaptable to different environments

metrics.performance_improvement: Real-time speech processing with sub-second latency
metrics.cost_savings: Utilizes open-source libraries to minimize development costs

primary_features: Caps Lock key trigger for voice recording
technical_innovations: Custom keyboard listener for recording control

learning_outcomes: Deep understanding of speech recognition technologies
Practical experience with generative AI models
Expertise in handling real-time audio streams
